title: Wanderer's Sketchbook

[[include component:image-block
|name=http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/wanderer-artworks/Thumbnail.jpg
|caption=Studying Wanderer.]]

I'm busy, but I'll draw occasionally. Maybe.

Painted with a brush
